title: Solaris 8 2/00 Operating System, x86 Platform Edition
description:
Solaris 8 2/00 Operating System, x86 Platform Edition

System Requirements 
Required
Intel Architecture (32-bit) platforms
Disk space: 600 MB for desktops; one GB for servers
Memory: 64 MB minimum

Detailed info is here: "http://www.sun.com/software/solaris/8/ds/ds-sol8oe/index.xml"

The torrent contains iso images of both CD1 and CD2.

CD1 was recompiled and it is now completely bootable (with no need of DCA)

I installed the Solaris 8 2/00 Operating System, x86 Platform Edition from these discs on Intel Celeron 300A, 128Mb RAM, ISA Trident TVGA9000i(512kb), ISA 3COM Etherlink-III 3C509B-TPO, IDE HDD 1.2Gb, CD-ROM. Works perfectly!


Thanks tj8 for "Sun_Solaris_8_intel_x86-32_edition_02_00" torrent.


PS The Solaris 8 Operating System has reached the end of its shipping life. Its end of service life will be March 31, 2012.
